text: liquors production for personal or family use amend rsa i to read as follows except as provided in this section this title shall not apply to the production of beer or wine other than fortified wine or liquor produced from beer or wine by persons over years of age for personal or family use when such beer or wine or liquor produced from beer or wine is not offered for sale or sold when produced in the following aggregate amount per household a not in excess of gallons per calendar year if there are or more persons producing beer or wine in such household b not in excess of gallons per calendar year if there is only one person producing beer or wine in such household c not in excess of the quantity of liquor that is produced from gallons of beer or wine per calendar year if there are or more persons producing beer or wine in such household d not in excess of the quantity of liquor that is produced from gallons of beer or wine per calendar year if there is only one person producing beer or wine in such household
